comments.body: 15k square metres according to google earth,
Only a lucky few have seen this building the way it was 6 years ago (a hole in the ground)

Man
They started construction when I joined PUC. They made us sit in this unfinished building for MBA. Graduated and its still under construction. Can understand the scale but the campus always felt like a construction no matter what. They keep building something or the other
It was the burial ground for our hopes and dreams
